website_summaries.verdict: Ten full-row pockets let you use this versatile chart for any purpose you like: sentences, calendar, chores and more.
pros: Each row measures 44 inches and can hold hold cards of several lengths
Dowel at top keeps nylon hanging straight
Works with almost any pre-printed cards, or you can make your own
cons: Nylon may not cover entire card

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great large family chore chart!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make our big family a custom chore chart. I LOVE it! I wrote on index cards. Names lined up on the left, daily family chores across the top, the child's chores to the right of their names. It will be simple to adjust chores... add or take away, re-distribute, etc. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Lora Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Wow, This has helped so much!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! I have major depression, anxiety, and complex PTSD so unfortunately, I struggle with taking care of myself. I bought this pocket chart in hopes of it helping me by reminding me to take a shower every day, brush my teeth, change clothes, etc. The cards I printed out were all free online as well! All I had to do was print and cut them out. So far it has helped a lot and I give myself rewards at the end of the day and I take away stickers (my favorite ones haha) or go to bed early to punish myself if I don't follow my schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Size does not match description
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I saw this pocket chart on sale. I looked at the dimensions and knew it would be perfect for my classroom. Two days later, it arrives, and the dimensions are WAY off. The product is 3 x wider than the description states. This pocket chart is not 10 x 40 like it says, it is 34 x 40. Total bummer.
customer_reviews.author: barbara grahn

customer_reviews.title: The pocket chart is great and just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: I actually have a concern regarding the packaging of this item, which is probably more feedback for Amazon than the seller (if dif from Amazon). The pocket chart is great and just what we wanted. However, the size and amount of the packaging materials was RIDICULOUS and so wasteful given the size of the product. As a hugely successful company, Amazon should be doing better at resourcing items and watching the waste it creates. Not ok! The photos I have included show the actual item (flat and somewhat flexible) and then the packaging....oversized box & WAAAAAAYYYYY too much paper!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Dulin

customer_reviews.title: Very large, but good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It is quite larger than I had anticipated, but works great. Good, sturdy quality backing with long plastic slots for word and picture cards. We use it for homeschool pre-K and my 2 and 4 year old boys went right up to it as soon as it was up. Perfect to have for sight words and letter of the week vocab to be in sight throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our homeschool classroom! Inspired creativity - my kids fought to use this tool!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! Very big and not very heavy, so it is easy to hang. The metal grommets at the top make it versatile for hanging anywhere. It is easy to find premade strips to use. There are so many ways to use a pocket chart. This was a great investment for our homeschool classroom! For our first project, we built sentences. It soon led to the kids creating a whole bunch of their own cards (using index cards, cut in 1/2). The creativity that this tool inspired, made it well-worth the (very reasonable) cost.
customer_reviews.author: O.G. Readmore

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: This pocket chart is thinner than the others I purchased on Amazon. You can see through the black. It also doesn't hang as nicely as the other charts I purchased. The positives are that the holes on top are protected well,so they probably won't rip, and the plastic is clear. Although it's not a horrible product, I was a tad disappointed, because Scholastic is a name that I rely on when purchasing classroom materials. I'm usually super happy with Scholastic products.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Quality is sorely lacking for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, quality is really poor. I like that there is a rod at the bottom and grommets at the top to hang on hooks. The quality though, is very flimsy. It feels cheapy and even sounds kinda crinkly when you unroll it. Not planning on lasting more than a few years, if that. I only purchased because I have no access to teacher stores in Hawaii and this included free shipping. Also, as another downside, they listed it $1.50 less a week later.
customer_reviews.author: A Good Friend

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is black, so it goes well with any classroom theme I have! I get tired of all the primary blues and reds and had been looking for a while to find one that would work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Good size, not too strong.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size, but it's not very strong. I use this in my classroom and one of the pockets broke on one side. I'm the only one who uses it, so I can't imagine this holding up if you were trying to use this as part of a kid's workstation or something. It covers part of the whiteboard from top to bottom, so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: EspritLyrique

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my poetry center
customer_reviews.text: I already have a ton of pocket charts, but the black really makes everything stand out. It is just what I needed for my Build a Poem pocket chart center. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I need more than one of these!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new black pocket chart. This chart is thick and sturdy. The pockets will last a long time, not flimsy like many pocket charts I have purchased in the past. The chart has 5 nice rings at the top for convenience when hanging. My only regret is that I did not order more than 1! I mean, who can have enough pocket charts teachers? I am glad to have black. Bye bye blue!
customer_reviews.author: carisa Bare

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely fantastic. My son and I use it for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely fantastic. My son and I use it for a variety of projects from math to science to english. We aren't limited to just words and poems on the chart. We even play sorting/counting games on it. It is very durable and that's coming from a mom of a 4 year old boy who's quite rough on things. He's even accidentally pulled it off the wall hooks and the chart had sustained no damage whatsoever. This is a great chart for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Colin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: When our son (2nd child) went to kindergarten we knew we wanted something better to do with his sight words than have them all a mess in a bag, this has been amazing! It let's him see all of them when doing his writing just like he would at school and keeps them origanized. With 2 more yet to go we ate so hsppy we bought this chart!
customer_reviews.author: momof4

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS. Pocket charts don't get any thinner or cheaper than this...
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in the quality of this chart. It is Definitely not made to hold up to regular use as it is made from a thin, crinkly material that seems like a dollar store product. DO NOT BUY THIS if you are looking for a quality pocket chart. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to start to learn sight words at home. We love “playing school” with this chart and it can be used in many ways. It’s very large and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Goetsch

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and cheap (and I'm not talking about the price)
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what everyone is talking about when they say that this is such a great product. I moved classrooms and needed to replace a pocket chart that I had left behind for the new teacher. This purchase was a disappointment. My old blue chart was thick and heavy weight. This is thin and light - hardly worth the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: missycat928

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product. I took one star off simply because the plastic across the front tends to bend out when I put cards in it and this makes it difficult to read at times. If you are using sentence strips or something not much taller than the clear plastic it should work fine.
customer_reviews.author: 2bizy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Fundations!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Fundations letter cards. I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: RRS

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than what I thought. You will need a good size vacant wall to hang this on.
customer_reviews.author: Mom and Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality and it's Black!
customer_reviews.text: I love color, but not when everything is a color in the classroom. This black is great because it is a great backdrop for whatever you may put into the chart. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H.

customer_reviews.title: pockets too short
customer_reviews.text: Pockets are good to hold sentence strips but they are a bit too "short" to hold letter cards.
customer_reviews.author: Blackula

customer_reviews.title: very nice item
customer_reviews.text: This is used in our break room at work, it is holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: countryliving

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this pocket chart. I bought it a couple of years ago and it still is in pretty good shape. I have one in my classroom and another one in my home office where I tutor kids. I always set it up so that students can easily access it and look at it. They love posting words, sentences, and picture cards. It is a great way to display what students are learning.
customer_reviews.author: vcricco@hotmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket chart!
customer_reviews.text: This pocket chart is very durable and sturdy! I use this pocket chart almost daily!
customer_reviews.author: cheyennne

customer_reviews.title: I bought 4!
customer_reviews.text: Love these for my classroom. I bought one. Loved it. Then bought 3 more later.
customer_reviews.author: Janine C.

customer_reviews.title: Needed a second chart!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to purchase a second pocket chart for my classroom. This one measures slightly larger than one I purchased at a local teaching store years ago, but it has the 10 pockets I was needing. Very happy with my purchase and would repurchase if needed.
customer_reviews.author: LBShortFam

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and it is perfect for displaying my twin boys' sight words and spelling words.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Montilliano

customer_reviews.title: Reading Tool
customer_reviews.text: An awesome tool for homeschooling- we use it mainly for sight words and days of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Renee D Boles

customer_reviews.title: I loved it! I bought this for my new classroom
customer_reviews.text: At my previous school, the classroom came with a large blue pocket chart. I loved it! I bought this for my new classroom. The size is perfect. But the quality is not as good as the blue one. But I would still repurchase because I think the price is at a good point.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: she teaches kindergarten and this will work perfect for her
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it, she teaches kindergarten and this will work perfect for her class
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheaply constructed pocket chart. Very thin nylon fabric and thin plastic card pockets. Very disappointed in the Scholastic product for my classroom. I won't purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Keaton

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and not usable
customer_reviews.text: The entire product was damaged. I’m so disappointed! I’m a teacher and needed this for distance learning this Monday. The box was half opened, the plastic bag it came in was FILTHY, the label was torn, the whole product was damaged. It’s not even usable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality!! Sounds like paper EVERYTIME I touch it!! The bottom rod is broke or bent real bad so it either sticks out in the middle or on the sides! Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Jenny Baggs

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for word study in my class. It is big enough to have 6 groups of words. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality pocket chart
customer_reviews.text: We have lots of pocket charts. Can't go wrong with teaching with pocket charts. Good quality. Nice color. Good quality plastic holders.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return it because i saw a review that said that the pockets where shorter that the description, but then when I opened the box I realized it was exactly what I needed so I won't be returning it. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: -- a good quality chart
customer_reviews.text: This item has worked very well in my classroom-- I've used it to display words, sentences, pics, etc. -- a good quality chart!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Arrived unusable (plastic was permanently bent out of shape).
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed on how it arrived. The plastic was bent on two rows in several areas and could not be straightened back out. Returned the item immediately.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Use for homeschooling a kindergarten
customer_reviews.text: Love it, use it daily with word blending and more. dont have to use sentence cards yet as the tabs are big enough to hold regular paper cutouts. The bar on the bottom is great for curl prevention. Would not hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A s

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big, less money the teacher supply store in town.
customer_reviews.author: Asem1994

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I failed to consider the measurements when I purchased this and it is way too big for my playroom. I will be giving it to my church for a sunday school room.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy! Pocket chart was larger than I expected. Can't wait to use it in my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for holding the sight words for my class!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for teachers and parents who are using flashcards. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Tomiko

customer_reviews.title: ... the "pockets" are not as deep as I would like them to be
customer_reviews.text: I find that the "pockets" are not as deep as I would like them to be. I have an older Carson Dellosa on that I like better. But it does work and is durable and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hill

customer_reviews.title: The price is good, and the chart is big The only drawback ...
customer_reviews.text: The price is good, and the chart is big The only drawback is that the material is cheep feeling. It's not as thick as most pocket charts.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product and tabs on top are reinforced. Definitely would recommend this product. This pocket chart worked really well in my classroom and is used almost everyday. Probably more useful in a elementary school classroom but I use it in a middle school classroom.
customer_reviews.author: BrownyGato

customer_reviews.title: The material is sturdy, and it hangs well from a few thumb ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my classroom on a daily basis to practice root words/affixes. The material is sturdy, and it hangs well from a few thumb tacks on a bulletin board.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hardison

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I expected. Good quality hanging pocket charts.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife uses in classroom. Other teachers have asked about it.
customer_reviews.author: TankJeep2015

customer_reviews.title: pretty good size and lots of room
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this for my own studying and use of flash cards ,i like how it has a lot of room .
customer_reviews.author: veronica Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket chart!
customer_reviews.text: Great pocket charts! Sturdy and helpful for homeschooling! I own several. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the black in my classroom. Well made. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as my board for the daily 5. I will be putting everyones names in the chart so every morning they can pick what their daily 5 choices are. It is a great way to have the students do this without spending extra time on it.
customer_reviews.author: MN Gal

customer_reviews.title: Review on Pocket Chart
customer_reviews.text: I really like my pocket chart. I use it everyday while teaching. It holds my instructional framework needed throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my classroom
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and hang up. I use this for many things in my k classroom. Great for sight words and games.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nash

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Was in excellent condition and received super fast! I would buy again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: ... a word wall and i appreciate this because I hate taping. Durable and and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My district is requiring us to have a word wall and i appreciate this because I hate taping. Durable and and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my 2nd grade classroom. I also like the price of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Alsup

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pockets are not quite as deep as I thought they were.
customer_reviews.author: Kandice Teutsch

customer_reviews.title: Will be a great Word
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit wider then I expected. Will be a great Word wall
customer_reviews.author: Angela Schmid

customer_reviews.title: Yay for black!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to be transitioning to black pocket charts in my first grade classroom. I don't have any primary colors in my classroom decor and my bright blue pocket charts have always driven me crazy! This pocket chart is great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the office I work in....to keep the guys on task (hvac business). Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Martha S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size for putting poems together or sorting math centers. I absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my first graders! Going on it's second year!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Pocket Chart
customer_reviews.text: This is a large pocket chart. It's perfect for whatever you'd like to use it for. I use it with sentence strips for reading. It has a sewn in rod at the bottom (as do all Scholastic pocket charts). So, it lays flat. The reinforced grommets are great, however, you will not be able to hang this on a wall using 3M clear hooks. So, I used bread ties to attach it to the 3M hooks I ordered to use with this. Works just fine. I do feel like I paid too much for this product. It's just a thin nylon sheet with plastic pockets on it. But, it works great for the purpose I'm using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Country Curly

customer_reviews.title: Far bigger than description says
customer_reviews.text: This is nearly double the size the description says it is. Unfortunately I waited too long to open the package and cannot return it. Super bummed that it won't work in my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Weiss

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is very delicate, but I am the only one that messes with it. I love it!! My son loves it! I bought 2!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Torres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A favorite for my class vocabulary work--useful for kinesthetic vocab matching games. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Fond Reader

customer_reviews.title: Needs Deeper Pockets
customer_reviews.text: The pockets are not deep enough to hold standard-sized cards.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Kujawski

customer_reviews.title: standard pocket chart
customer_reviews.text: It is good quality and working well for me. I only wish pocket charts were universal in where they put their holes for hanging.
customer_reviews.author: D. Yerby

customer_reviews.title: Much larger than stated!
customer_reviews.text: Word to the wise. DO NOT trust the size listed in the specifications section. This pocket chart is MUCH bigger than listed. On the original packaging it says 34" x 44".
customer_reviews.author: Breanne Stump

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize this was the large chart until it arrived. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Great teaching aid
customer_reviews.text: Looks very good in my classroom. Can use it for any subject.
customer_reviews.author: K Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: It's good. It can hold 100 papers if it is ...
customer_reviews.text: It's good. It can hold 100 papers if it is the paper is 3 inches tall. It arrived very quickly. It can also hold pens, markers, and pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Browning

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: This item was perfect, just what i wanted nice size, nice color and arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Purdom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Crisp, true black, and heavy enough to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Diana V

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hear any complaints (and believe me I would) so assume they are happy.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for school. Didn't hear any complaints (and believe me I would) so assume they are happy.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Harris

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 one had the clear pocket missing on the top... Still made it work for the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew and Tina R.

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: A staple for any classroom. It's good for word walls, flashcards, mix-and-match games, or posting standards. I ended up buying two more, if that says anything! They make for easy clean-up at the end of the year too, since they can be easily taken down or moved. My only suggestion is buying command hooks to hang them. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This pocket chart is really nice and sturdy. It has been a great addition to my classroom and still looks brand new after daily use!
customer_reviews.author: K. Cosby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! arrived fast and as described! love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: meljos

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm able to fill this up with lots of words. Fast shipping and good product. I'd prefer the plastic to cover more of the cards but I suppose I'm only noticing it because I use the cheap cards but overall it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Homeschooling is more fun with this wall pocket to help organize their lessons. Thanks for offering it for such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Excellent quality. Far exceeding my expectations! Thank you, will be ordering more products soon!
customer_reviews.author: marilyn eustache

customer_reviews.title: Love It !
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect size. I like the quality of the plastic pockets. I am using it as a game board for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Carla B

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: my boys like to have this every month they change the dates and seasons month and put bdays up special dates .
customer_reviews.author: Gina Eagen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a word wall in my classroom, Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Banguel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the size and quality of this pocket chart.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf3

customer_reviews.title: Homeschooling!
customer_reviews.text: This has been so helpful in my classroom , my son and I just love it. Best pocket chart out there.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: You get exactly what you see. Good product for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Ray

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for a history card timeline in our homeschool. It's nice to have all the cards displayed rather than in stacks.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: light and cheap material...too fragile almost paper thin...not what I expected...

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought the quality would have been a little better but it's good.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product- the work I placed in this chart -really contrasted against the black...just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: rosemary  crespo- storelee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Went so GREAT with my black and white theme at school!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mora

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The black chart will really show off my vocabulary strips!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Browder

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my Mami, she is a Jr High School teacher. She kept complaining that she could only find this product in the teacher store and that they were expensive...of course I hopped on to Amazon and found this item for her. Ordered it, it arrived promptly and was exactly what she wanted for the best price! It was black and she uses neon words, eye catching. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nilda Iris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the black, matches my decor and makes the items in the chart "pop" with bright color!
customer_reviews.author: Deana LaPlatney

product_meta.title: Standard Pocket Chart, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:BluePocket chart features 10 see-through plastic pockets.
feature_bullets: Plastic dowel rod stitched inside each pocket chart for stability
Nylon pocket chart (34 inches x 44 inches) with 10 see-through pockets
